views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

Add custom backgrounds from your camera roll to the Notification Center on iOS 10+.
Adjust settings in the settings application.

-Fixed Landscape Bug issue where the image wouldn't fill the NC.
-Fixed Settings app crashing due to no image being set. 
-Optimized code for better performance.


-Fixed dark wallpaper issue due to background blur of the Notification Center


-Fixed an issue where an image would appear to be stretched due to wrong aspect ratio.
-Added an alert for the user to choose between a cropped an uncropped image.
-Added the ability to choose from different albums instead of just moments.
-Should be less laggy now.
